forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 71F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. Thunder possible. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 67F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Saturday
